# ejs-playground

 [![Support me on Patreon][badge_patreon]][patreon] [![Buy me a book][badge_amazon]][amazon] [![PayPal][badge_paypal_donate]][paypal-donations] [![Ask me anything](https://img.shields.io/badge/ask%20me-anything-1abc9c.svg)](https://github.com/IonicaBizau/ama) [![Version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/ejs-playground.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/ejs-playground) [![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dt/ejs-playground.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/ejs-playground) 
 

> A web app to play with EJS templates.

[![ejs-playground](http://i.imgur.com/Hbq4N7t.png)](https://ionicabizau.github.io/ejs-playground)

### 第一行`ejs`代码
```ejs
OK, so have fun!
-------------------
<%
    var num = 100;
%>
Print the number defined:
<% if(num > 50) { %><%= num %><% } %>
```
